hooks.command: echo 'Post-edit hook: add your typecheck or lint command here'
WORK_DIR=$(pwd | grep -o '[^/]*$') && echo "=== CONTEXT: $WORK_DIR ===" && echo 'Working in:' $(pwd) && echo 'Branch:' $(git branch --show-current) && git status --porcelain | head -5
if git diff --quiet && git diff --staged --quiet; then echo 'No changes detected'; else echo 'Changes ready for commit:' && git status --porcelain; fi
